Q1: How does Orading simple conversion works?
A1: It executes a market order on your behalf on your selected exchange accounts. Conversion is available for all existing market trading pairs on supported exchanges.
Q2: What are the requirements to use the portal?
A2: All functions of the portal (checking indicative prices / confirming trades) will be available when you log-in to your Orading account. Please note that standard exchange withdrawal limits will apply.
Q3: What are the benefits of using the crypto converter portal?
A3: Users can easily convert their assets on the portal without having to worry about complicated matters such as the order book and trading fees.
Q4: What are the minimum and maximum trade amounts?
A4: The minimum and maximum trade amounts depend on the exchange you would like to trade, for example minimum value of 10 USDT for most of trading pairs in Binance exchange. You can also preview other details before conversion.
A5: Trades are settled directly to your exchange accountâ€™s spot wallet. Settlement will usually occur immediately after you confirm a trade.
A6: It's actually dependent on the exchange you would like to execute the conversion process.
Q7: Where can I check my trade history?
A7: Log into your account and go to trade history.
Q8: Can I confirm trades on credit (without coins in my exchange spot wallet)?
A8: No, you must have the required amount of coins for the trade in your exchange spot wallet (not margin or futures wallets).
